select * from ( select row_number() over( order by
user_id ASC,
user_id DESC,
user_nm ASC,
user_nm DESC,
reg_dt ASC,
reg_dt DESC,
user_id asc, authrt_cd) as rn , *, CASE WHEN user_sn IN (SELECT user_sn FROM dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_sso) THEN 'sso' WHEN user_sn IN (SELECT user_sn FROM dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_onepass) THEN 'onepass' ELSE '-' END AS source_table, case when user_sn in ( select user_sn from dqvs.dvs_api_mt_key) then 'Y' else 'N' end as api from ( select * from ( select cmu.user_sn, authrt_cd, cmu.bzmn_sn, agency.brno, cmptnc_zone_cd, ctpv_nm, sgg_nm, coalesce(cmsl.user_id, cmo."ci", '-') as user_id, coalesce(cmsl.user_nm, cmo.user_nm, '-') as user_nm, coalesce(cmsl.eml_addr, '-') as eml_addr, coalesce(dqvs.pca_decrypt(cmsl.mbl_telno, '150'), dqvs.pca_decrypt(cmo.mbl_telno, '150'), '-') as user_tel, dqvs.pca_decrypt(assi_telno, '150') as assi_telno, (select authrt_nm from dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_auth dcma where authrt_cd =cmu.authrt_cd), (select case when drma.co_nm1 is not null then drma.co_nm1 when drma.co_nm2 is not null then drma.co_nm2 else null end as co_nm from (select co_nm as co_nm1, null as co_nm2 from dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_agency where bzmn_sn = cmu.bzmn_sn union all select null as co_nm1, co_nm as co_nm2 from dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_request where bzmn_sn = cmu.bzmn_sn) drma limit 1), case when acnt_stts_cd = '1' then (select cd_nm from dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_code where cd_group = 'aprv_stts_cd' and cd=cmu.aprv_stts_cd) else (select cd_nm from dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_code where cd_group = 'acnt_stts_cd' and cd=acnt_stts_cd) end as stts_cd, TO_CHAR(cmu.reg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reg_dt from dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_user cmu left join dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_onepass cmo on cmu.user_sn = cmo.user_sn left join dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_sso cmsl on cmu.user_sn = cmsl.user_sn left join dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_agency agency on agency.bzmn_sn = cmu.bzmn_sn left join ( select stdg_cd, ctpv_nm, sgg_nm from dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_area)g on cmu.cmptnc_zone_cd = g.stdg_cd where 1=1
and (authrt_cd = 'S01' and ( cmu.bzmn_sn in ( select bzmn_sn from dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_agency where up_brno = ( select brno from dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_agency where bzmn_sn = #{LoginUserBzmnSn} ) ) or cmu.bzmn_sn = #{LoginUserBzmnSn} )) or (authrt_cd = 'S02' and agency.bzmn_se_cd = '2' and agency.bzmn_sn = #{LoginUserBzmnSn})
) a where user_sn IN (SELECT user_sn FROM dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_sso) OR user_sn IN (SELECT user_sn FROM dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_onepass) )T where 1 = 1 and stts_cd != '삭제'
and T.cmptnc_zone_cd like #{cmptnc_zone_cd} || '%'
and T.user_id like '%' || #{search_wrd} || '%'
and T.user_nm like '%' || #{search_wrd} || '%'
and T.co_nm like '%' || #{search_wrd} || '%'
and T.brno like '%' || #{search_wrd} || '%'
and T.bzmn_sn like '%' || #{search_wrd} || '%'
and T.stts_cd = #{stts_cd}
and T.authrt_cd = #{authrt_cd}
order by rn asc ) c where 1=1
AND c.rn <= (CAST(#{take} AS INTEGER) + CAST(#{skip} AS INTEGER))
AND c.rn > CAST(#{skip} AS INTEGER)

select count(*) from ( select row_number() over( order by user_id asc, authrt_cd) as rn , *, CASE WHEN user_sn IN (SELECT user_sn FROM dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_sso) THEN 'sso' WHEN user_sn IN (SELECT user_sn FROM dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_onepass) THEN 'onepass' ELSE '-' END AS source_table, case when user_sn in ( select user_sn from dqvs.dvs_api_mt_key) then 'Y' else 'N' end as api from ( select * from ( select cmu.user_sn, authrt_cd, cmu.bzmn_sn, agency.brno, cmptnc_zone_cd, ctpv_nm, sgg_nm, coalesce(cmsl.user_id, cmo."ci", '-') as user_id, coalesce(cmsl.user_nm, cmo.user_nm, '-') as user_nm, coalesce(cmsl.eml_addr, '-') as eml_addr, coalesce(dqvs.pca_decrypt(cmsl.mbl_telno, '150'), dqvs.pca_decrypt(cmo.mbl_telno, '150'), '-') as user_tel, dqvs.pca_decrypt(assi_telno, '150') as assi_telno, (select authrt_nm from dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_auth dcma where authrt_cd =cmu.authrt_cd), (select case when drma.co_nm1 is not null then drma.co_nm1 when drma.co_nm2 is not null then drma.co_nm2 else null end as co_nm from (select co_nm as co_nm1, null as co_nm2 from dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_agency where bzmn_sn = cmu.bzmn_sn union all select null as co_nm1, co_nm as co_nm2 from dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_request where bzmn_sn = cmu.bzmn_sn) drma limit 1), case when acnt_stts_cd = '1' then (select cd_nm from dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_code where cd_group = 'aprv_stts_cd' and cd=cmu.aprv_stts_cd) else (select cd_nm from dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_code where cd_group = 'acnt_stts_cd' and cd=acnt_stts_cd) end as stts_cd, TO_CHAR(cmu.reg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reg_dt from dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_user cmu left join dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_onepass cmo on cmu.user_sn = cmo.user_sn left join dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_sso cmsl on cmu.user_sn = cmsl.user_sn left join dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_agency agency on agency.bzmn_sn = cmu.bzmn_sn left join ( select stdg_cd, ctpv_nm, sgg_nm from dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_area)g on cmu.cmptnc_zone_cd = g.stdg_cd where 1=1
and (authrt_cd = 'S01' and ( cmu.bzmn_sn in ( select bzmn_sn from dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_agency where up_brno = ( select brno from dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_agency where bzmn_sn = #{LoginUserBzmnSn} ) ) or cmu.bzmn_sn = #{LoginUserBzmnSn} )) or (authrt_cd = 'S02' and agency.bzmn_se_cd = '2' and agency.bzmn_sn = #{LoginUserBzmnSn})
) a where user_sn IN (SELECT user_sn FROM dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_sso) OR user_sn IN (SELECT user_sn FROM dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_onepass) )T where 1 = 1 and stts_cd != '삭제'
and T.cmptnc_zone_cd like #{cmptnc_zone_cd} || '%'
and T.user_id like '%' || #{search_wrd} || '%'
and T.user_nm like '%' || #{search_wrd} || '%'
and T.co_nm like '%' || #{search_wrd} || '%'
and T.brno like '%' || #{search_wrd} || '%'
and T.bzmn_sn like '%' || #{search_wrd} || '%'
and T.stts_cd = #{stts_cd}
and T.authrt_cd = #{authrt_cd}
order by rn asc ) c

SELECT T.* FROM ( select row_number() over() as rn, T2.*, COALESCE(NULLIF(T2.cmptnc_zone,''), '-') AS cmptnc_zone_nm from ( select COALESCE(NULLIF(drma.brno, ''), '-') brno, up_brno, drma.bzmn_sn, co_nm, COALESCE(NULLIF(road_nm_addr, ''), '-') road_nm_addr, reg_cmptnc_cd, bzmn_se_cd, CASE WHEN bzmn_se_cd = '1' THEN '주사업소' WHEN bzmn_se_cd = '2' THEN '영업소' ELSE '-' END AS bzmn_se_cd_nm, (SELECT COALESCE(NULLIF(cd_nm, ''), '-') cd_nm FROM dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_code dcmc WHERE cd_group = 'bsn_stts_cd' AND cd = bsn_stts_cd) bsn_stts_cd_nm, (SELECT concat(ctpv_nm, ' ', sgg_nm) FROM dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_area WHERE stdg_cd = sgg_cd) cmptnc_zone, oper_bgng_dt, oper_end_dt, COALESCE(NULLIF(to_char(mdfcn_dt ::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), ''), '-') drma_mdfcn_dt from dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_agency drma union all select COALESCE(NULLIF(brno, ''),'-') brno, up_brno, bzmn_sn, co_nm, COALESCE(NULLIF(road_nm_addr, ''),'-') road_nm_addr, reg_cmptnc_cd, bzmn_se_cd, CASE WHEN bzmn_se_cd = '1' THEN '주사업소' WHEN bzmn_se_cd = '2' THEN '영업소' ELSE '-' END AS bzmn_se_cd_nm, (SELECT COALESCE(NULLIF(cd_nm, ''), '-') cd_nm FROM dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_code dcmc WHERE cd_group = 'bsn_stts_cd' AND cd = bsn_stts_cd) bsn_stts_cd_nm, (SELECT concat(ctpv_nm, ' ', sgg_nm) FROM dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_area WHERE stdg_cd = sgg_cd) cmptnc_zone, oper_bgng_dt, oper_end_dt, COALESCE(NULLIF(to_char(mdfcn_dt ::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), ''), '-') drma_mdfcn_dt from dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_request ) T2 where 1=1
and co_nm like '%' || #{coNm} || '%'
and brno like '%' || REGEXP_REPLACE(#{brno}, '\D', '', 'g') || '%'
) T WHERE 1 = 1
AND T.rn <= (CAST(#{take} AS INTEGER) + CAST(#{skip} AS INTEGER))
AND T.rn > CAST(#{skip} AS INTEGER)
ORDER BY T.rn ASC

select count(*) from ( select row_number() over() as rn, T2.*, COALESCE(NULLIF(T2.cmptnc_zone,''), '-') AS cmptnc_zone_nm from ( select drma.brno, up_brno, drma.bzmn_sn, co_nm, road_nm_addr, reg_cmptnc_cd, bzmn_se_cd, CASE WHEN bzmn_se_cd = '1' THEN '주사업소' WHEN bzmn_se_cd = '2' THEN '영업소' END AS bzmn_se_cd_nm, (SELECT cd_nm FROM dvs_cmm_mt_code dcmc WHERE cd_group = 'bsn_stts_cd' AND cd = bsn_stts_cd) bsn_stts_cd_nm, (SELECT concat(ctpv_nm, ' ', sgg_nm) FROM dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_area WHERE stdg_cd = sgg_cd) cmptnc_zone, oper_bgng_dt, oper_end_dt, to_char(mdfcn_dt ::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') drma_mdfcn_dt from dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_agency drma union all select brno, up_brno, bzmn_sn, co_nm, road_nm_addr, reg_cmptnc_cd, bzmn_se_cd, CASE WHEN bzmn_se_cd = '1' THEN '주사업소' WHEN bzmn_se_cd = '2' THEN '영업소' END AS bzmn_se_cd_nm, (SELECT cd_nm FROM dvs_cmm_mt_code dcmc WHERE cd_group = 'bsn_stts_cd' AND cd = bsn_stts_cd) bsn_stts_cd_nm, (SELECT concat(ctpv_nm, ' ', sgg_nm) FROM dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_area WHERE stdg_cd = sgg_cd) cmptnc_zone, oper_bgng_dt, oper_end_dt, to_char(mdfcn_dt ::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') drma_mdfcn_dt from dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_request ) T2 where 1=1
and co_nm like '%' || #{coNm} || '%'
and brno like '%' || REGEXP_REPLACE(#{brno}, '\D', '', 'g') || '%'
) T
select cd, cd_nm from dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_code where cd_group = 'bzmn_se_cd'
SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTRING(stdg_cd, 1, 2) AS ctpv_cd, ctpv_nm FROM dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_area where mtnabn_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY ctpv_cd
SELECT a.aprv_stts_cd FROM dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_agency a LEFT JOIN dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_user u ON a.bzmn_sn = u.bzmn_sn WHERE u.user_sn = #{userSn}
select case when authrt_cd = 'G01' then '1' else '2' end as authrt_cd from dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_user where user_sn = #{userSn}

select distinct SUBSTRING(stdg_cd, 3, 3) AS sgg_cd, sgg_nm from dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_area where mtnabn_yn = 'Y' and sgg_nm != ''
and stdg_cd LIKE CONCAT(#{ctpvCd}, '%')
order by sgg_cd
select cd, cd_nm from dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_code where cd_group = 'bsn_stts_cd' order by cd
select authrt_cd, authrt_nm from dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_auth where use_yn = 'Y'
